titleInfo.title: Mutual Constraints of the Phonetics-Phonology Interface

mods.abstract: It is shown that phonological and phonetic representations can be formally described and interfaced using an ontology where events are taken as derivative of instants. The approach followed here regards both research domains as constraining each other and enables a representaion of both domains in constraint-based grammars.
